room_title: Escape room "The Honky Tonk" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: Meh, It's ok. This is your standard small escape room. Some of the puzzles were unique. There was one I particularly enjoyed, it dealt with a magnet on a stick. Having done countless games this one is low on my list. There are no surprises here but you will probably enjoy it. Not recommend for enthusiasts like myself.

room_title: Escape room "The Honky Tonk" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: Our group of six had the best time in the Honky Tonk room! Did this for my birthday and we are coming back for more! So well thought-out and I don't know how they come up with this stuff!

room_title: Escape room "The Honky Tonk" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: What a great way to spend an hour! There were 6 of us in the Honky Tonk and we were able to escape with a few minutes left. There is a good variety of challenges and they definitely take some team work! Highly recommend this for anyone looking for a unique & fun experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Honky Tonk" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: Our family of 8 (ages 18 thru 80+) had an absolute blast! We conquered the Honky Tonk room (with a few helpful clues) with about 9 minutes to spare. Highly recommend this for a fun family outing!

room_title: Escape room "The Honky Tonk" by Beach Escape Game in Tampa
review: First time ever going to an Escape room challenge. It was a blast looking for clues and solving puzzles to escape the room within 60 mins. Tons a fun! I highly recommend fun for all!
